model.online

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.online.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is from the Client's perspective. It is in charge of being the intermediary between GUI (MainWindow) and the client's thread which is in contact with the server (ClientController).
    Author:
    PMC

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(MainWindow mW)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chooseTeamFromServer(org.json.JSONObject newGameJSON)
      This method is used to notify GUI that a team should be chosen between the teams stored in newGameJSON
      org.json.JSONObject getGameReport()
      This method is used to get the JSONObject that represents the game from the GUI
      Player getPlayer()
      This method is used to get the player that plays in this client.
      void join(java.lang.String name, Color color)
      This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with the server) that it needs to send to server the info of the player that has been chosen in this current client
      void sendChosenTeamToServer(org.json.JSONObject selectedTeamJSON)
      This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with server) that it needs to send to the server a new version of the game JSON that has been completed with the client's team preference.
      void startMatch(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      This method is used to start the client thread that allows the exchange of information between server and the current client
      void updateGameFromServer(org.json.JSONObject newGameJSON)
      This method is used to send to GUI the JSONObject report of the game that has been sent by the server from another client
      void updateGameToServer()
      This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with the server) that it needs to send to the server the new state of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getGameReport

        public org.json.JSONObject getGameReport()
        This method is used to get the JSONObject that represents the game from the GUI
        Returns:
        JSONObject that represents the report of the game being played currently

      • updateGameFromServer

        public void updateGameFromServer(org.json.JSONObject newGameJSON)
        This method is used to send to GUI the JSONObject report of the game that has been sent by the server from another client
        Parameters:
        newGameJSON - JSONObject that represents the report of the game sent by server

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch(java.lang.String ip,
                       int port)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to start the client thread that allows the exchange of information between server and the current client
        Parameters:
        ip - String that represents the ip in which the server is operating
        port - Integer that represents the port in which the ip of the server is operating
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - completar

      • updateGameToServer

        public void updateGameToServer()
        This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with the server) that it needs to send to the server the new state of the game.

      • join

        public void join(java.lang.String name,
                 Color color)
        This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with the server) that it needs to send to server the info of the player that has been chosen in this current client
        Parameters:
        name - String that represents the name of the player, chosen previously in GUI.
        color - Color that represents the color of the player, chosen previously in GUI.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        This method is used to get the player that plays in this client.
        Returns:
        The player that plays in this client.

      • chooseTeamFromServer

        public void chooseTeamFromServer(org.json.JSONObject newGameJSON)
        This method is used to notify GUI that a team should be chosen between the teams stored in newGameJSON
        Parameters:
        newGameJSON - Part of the game JSON that should be completed by client with the team chosen before returning it to server

      • sendChosenTeamToServer

        public void sendChosenTeamToServer(org.json.JSONObject selectedTeamJSON)
        This method is used to notify the client thread (in direct contact with server) that it needs to send to the server a new version of the game JSON that has been completed with the client's team preference.
        Parameters:
        selectedTeamJSON - New version of the game JSON that has been completed with the client's team preference.
